name: Pumpkin Boy Volcano Run
description:
COOL PUMPKIN BOY CHARACTER
Collect coins and run for your life as the awesome pumpkin boy character. Complete missions, escape danger and become a real adventurer if you've got what it takes...
PUSH YOUR SPEED TO THE LIMIT AND DO ALL WHAT YOU MUST
Run, jump through the scary forest, survive a rush of obstacles, enemies in a huge volcano world, and hold on for dear life in the mysterious scary volcano! A real runner could do it!
JUMP PAST AND THROUGH ALL TRAPS AND ENEMIES
Rush past scary obstacles and different levels in a super-fast dash, jump and slide fast under dangerous traps!
GRAB POWER-UPS FOR A SUPER CHARGE!
Use powerful upgrades like the Invisible to become more powerful, increase your speed, kill all your enemies, unlock new power-up magnets and grow your capacity!
LEAVE ALL YOUR FRIENDS IN THE VOLCANO!
A game made only for real runners who are not afraid of pushing their speed to the limit in a dangerous dash to victory. Do you have what it takes to be a real adventurer? Run, fly, dive, swim and prove it!

86d8b7539b
